Description.Text: Vizavi is a modern 3-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation near the heart of Ekaterinburg. Highlights include an indoor swimming pool, sauna, onsite restaurant and free Wi-Fi and parking. Ekaterinburg is a major city in the Ural Federal District. Once known as an industrial centre, the city also has a strong cultural heritage. Places of interest include the Church on Blood in Honour of All Saints Resplendent in the Russian Land, Rastorguyev-Kharitonov Palace, Kamenniye Palatki and Shartash Lake. Local tram services provide fast and easy access to popular Ekaterinburg destinations. The hotel occupies a contemporary mid-rise property with a curved glass facade. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool and sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 21sqm and decorated in a bright, cosy style. Amenities include a mini-bar, TV, safe, work desk and en-suite bathroom. The restaurant offers regional and international dishes in a charming and intimate setting. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the stylish hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. The hotel offers a chargeable airport shuttle service.
